QuestData.Title: Tricks of the Trade
QuestData.Description:
To pass the time, traders have been known to consume beverages of an inspired nature, if you know what I mean.
Sometimes, they drink a bit too much. Your trader might have stumbled beyond the gates and passed out under a tree. It's been known to happen from time to time.
Luckily, I have a brew that I use to rouse groggy traders. One splash and I find they're more willing to work.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and rouse the missing Trader.
